page.title: 05THE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content:
THE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE IN BIGGIN HILL
The Industrial Estate is located on the southern edge of the airort and comprises 16 modern general purpose factories and warehouses. Most of the companies use their buildings for storage and distribution purposes and employ between 5 to 15 people. One of the companies, Laser-Tech uses a low powered laser for cutting plastics for display signs. This indusrry chose the site because of its proximity to London and the motorway system. The equipment they use is custom built. The raw materials come from various British plastic manufacturers and all the products are sold on the home market. They employ 5 people, two in management who deal with purchasding, sales and production, one secretary and two production workers.
